attributes.action: Ensure that All Members of Parliament and the House of Lords attend an IT course.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many Members of both houses, when being interviewed by the various news media, seem to be quite happy, even almost proud, to state their total lack of knowledge of anything to do with computers and computing.  This is a disgrace in this technological age, especially when the present government is so enamoured of 'databases' of various flavours, and should be remedied immediately.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
